lst.name: sentence
lst.str: An agreement for four mln engineering workers raised pay by 3.7 pct from April 1, and then raises pay by another two pct from April 1, 1988 and by 2.5 pct from April 1, 1989.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The improvement in West German terms of trade, providing room for non-inflationary expansion of domestic demand in excess of output growth, put the overshoot of central bank money stock in a more positive light, he said on Thursday.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "I am thinking above all of the fact that in the course of this year we will in all probability have a stronger mark against other currencies than last year," he said, adding "Without this mark revaluation effect, we would have had to say that the wage rise agreements were not neutral for prices."
